turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a charge on my recent bill. I was charged $75 for a service I didn't authorize.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I can definitely help you with that. Can I get your account number or the phone number associated with the account, please?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. One moment while I pull up your account... Okay, I see the charge for $75. It's listed as a premium content subscription. Do you recall subscribing to any new services recently?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: No, absolutely not! That's why I'm calling. I never signed up for any premium content. I'm getting really frustrated with these unexpected charges.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand your frustration. Let me see what I can do. It appears this subscription started on the 15th of last month. To remove the charge, just cancel the subscription.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Right, but how did I get subscribed in the first place without my consent? And will I get a refund for the $75? That’s the bigger issue here.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a valid question. While I don't have the exact details of how the subscription was initiated, I can process a one-time refund of $75 to your account. Please allow 5-7 business days for it to reflect on your statement. I have also cancelled the premium content subscription for you. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, a refund is good. Thank you for taking care of that. No, that's all for now.
